task_summary: Detect the green bin and its lid, align near the hinge/handle area, and execute an open-lid action. Verify openness and retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A mobile manipulator with a parallel gripper approaches a green garbage bin with a hinged lid and plastic liner. The objective is to lift/open the lid. The behavior first perceives the bin and lid, positions above the lid, orients the wrist to a side approach, and refines alignment. The gripper is pre-opened to avoid collisions, then an OpenContainer primitive for a bin lid is executed. A brief wait allows the lid to settle before the system confirms the lid state and retreats to a safe distance. The scene includes a table and wall near the bin, imposing clearance constraints.
preconditions: Robot has free workspace in front of the bin
Green bin and lid are visible to perception
Gripper functional and free of objects
No human/obstacle blocking the lid motion arc
stepwise_plan: Detect green bin and detect its lid.
Move above the lid and set wrist yaw to 90Â°.
Approach and align to the lid edge/handle with tight tolerance.
Execute bin-lid open primitive; wait briefly.
Verify lid is open and retreat to safe standoff.
success_criteria: Lid visibly rotated open from closed state
No collision with bin, table, or wall
Robot ends at safe standoff pose
failure_and_recovery: Perception fails: re-detect target and re-approach
Misalignment: re-run alignment and yaw set
Lid stuck: reattempt OpenContainer with slightly different contact point
task_long_description.termination: Terminate once the lid is confirmed open or after repeated failures that exceed safety thresholds.

frame_3.now_evidence: first stable contact and alignment cue visible
frame_3.predicts_next: push actuation expected; confirms goal direction

task_instruction: lift open green garbage can lid

node_specs.description: Move to a pregrasp pose above the lid.

failure_modes: Lid obstructed by table or wall
recovery_strategy: Adjust yaw and tolerance, then retry alignment
Slightly change contact point and re-execute OpenContainer
assumptions: Symbolic targets 'green_bin' and 'bin_lid' bound to the visible green garbage can and its hinged lid.
OpenContainer with container_type='bin_lid' encapsulates the required lift motion.
Frames show side approach near a table; clearance is sufficient to open.

expected_success_criteria: ContainerOpen returns success and robot retreats
